faq.question: How do I install Core App?
faq.answer:
The 12 words (your “seed” or secret recovery phrase) are your master seed that generates all your wallet’s addresses and private keys. In other words, with this secret phrase, ANYONE can access your wallet’s funds anytime and anywhere from Unium or another wallet.

For this reason, do not store your secret 12-word phrase in any digital format, such as a screenshot or picture on your phone, a document on your computer, USB drive, or in the cloud (e.g. Dropbox), an email, etc.

Hackers can access digital files and information, but they can’t access an old-fashioned piece of paper!

The 12 words (your “seed” or secret recovery phrase) are your master seed that generates all your wallet’s addresses and private keys. In other words, with this secret phrase, ANYONE can access your wallet’s funds anytime and anywhere from Unium or another wallet.

community.title: Technology
community.video: <iframe src="https://iframe.videodelivery.net/912d9ee7a940b1c6cdeabbcb15821e9b?muted=true&preload=true&loop=true&autoplay=true&controls=false" style="border: none; position: absolute; top: 0; height: 100%; width: 100%;"  allow="accelerometer; gyroscope; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture;" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
community.subTitle: Core brings a new standard in technology — open and inclusive — to challenge the old and activate a new age of sustainable, globally-distributed innovation.
community.text:
From the incremental to global, Core improves how we interact, transact,
and create — and ultimately operate
as a global society. Core is a blockchain platform built on the groundbreaking Ouroboros proof-of-stake consensus protocol, and developed using the Haskell programming language.

community.title: Research
community.video: <iframe src="https://iframe.videodelivery.net/ba02c51bd5a64eb4430aaf30f88b911b?muted=true&preload=true&loop=true&autoplay=true&controls=false" style="border: none; position: absolute; top: 0; height: 100%; width: 100%;"  allow="accelerometer; gyroscope; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture;" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
community.subTitle: All cutting-edge technology requires a vast amount of research to become the frontier in its field.
community.text: Hypercube's team, which consists of professionals from various academic disciplines, has done extensive research to not only understand the technical limitations that blockchain technology faces, but also develop a philosophical understanding of the human psyche to discover some of the objections people have about towards blockchain technology. We at Hypercube are proud to announce that we have answered all of the questions that formed the basis for our research, and have presented it in a simplified, secure, and scalable solution - the Hypercube blockchain ecosystem.

community.title: Purpose
community.video: <iframe src="https://iframe.videodelivery.net/112f3c0278f210a880e8ea0abdef6913?muted=true&preload=true&loop=true&autoplay=true&controls=false" style="border: none; position: absolute; top: 0; height: 100%; width: 100%;"  allow="accelerometer; gyroscope; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture;" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
community.subTitle: To transcend blockchain technology, with the goal to lead the way in blockchain mass-adoption, by addressing the obstacles that current blockchain solutions face - namely the scalability, interoperability, security and usability of blockchain technology.
community.text:
One of the major approaches to overcome the performance and scalability limitations of current blockchain protocols is to use true sharding, which is to split the overhead of processing transactions among multiple, smaller groups of nodes. In parallel, these groups work to optimize performance while requiring substantially smaller communication, computing, and storage per node, enabling the device to scale to large networks. Hypercube is powered by Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning principles at the core of its blockchain- its consensus, together with side chains and off-chain transaction processing to enable both the acceleration of block broadcasting to the chain and scaling out through asynchronous consensus zones.

Hypercube overcomes the security concerns associated with blockchain technology, such as 51% attacks and vendor exploits, by combing secure multi-party computation and attribute-based encryption, together with other security practices such as committee reconfiguration and zero knowledge proof. These proven security practices enable anyone to transact freely and securely in the Hypercube ecosystem.

A lot of research is being done into creating true cross-chain communication between the various blockchains. Hypercube has combined some of these solutions to create one hybrid cross-chain communication protocol. This hybrid solution makes use of hash-locking, notary schemes, and blockchain bridges, together with trusted relays, side chains, and blockchain migrators. Thus, creating an advanced solution that allows the Hypercube blockchain to become the internet of blockchains.

Our blockchain ecosystem incorporates a combination of public blockchain sharding, an optimal AI powered consensus, as well as a cross-chain and cross-shard communication protocol into a hybrid solution that is not only Byzantine fault, but also has very high throughputs through block pipelining.

and secure. Definitely worth checking out and experiencing
